description: Defines a NoteCard component using LightningJS, rendering a note with title, summary, date, and delete button, including methods for handling interactions and formatting date.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays note details with interaction handlers.

methods.name: noteSummary
methods.description: Computed property returning the note's summary or a default message.

methods.name: noteDate
methods.description: Computed property returning the formatted creation date of the note.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles click event to emit 'select' with the current note.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles delete event to emit 'delete' with the current note.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a locale string.
